      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Returns the message. "[type]" will be replaced by a text for the datatype, defined via setDecimal() and setInteger(), and "[range]" will be replaced by the range. Default is: "Please enter a [type] in range [range]:"
        Returns:
